channel.title: Weird? Really need some help
channel.description:
Alright this a really weird problem. So I just added martins auto donation system http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/323057-martins-auto-donation-system.html it works perfectly but when I run my source I get all these messages it still works just want to get rid of them because I believe they cause lag.
[code=java][2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegist eringDriver.java:282) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.ja va:579) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.ja va:221) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.createConnection(MadT urnipConnection.java:14) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.run(MadTurnipConnecti on.java:31) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: java.sql.SQLException: Access denied for user 'username'@'loc alhost' (using password: YES) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j ava:1055) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j ava:956) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 3536) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 3468) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 917) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.secureAuth411(MysqlIO.java:397 4) [2/08/12 3:37 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1282)

item.title: Weird? Really need some help
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

Alright this a really weird problem. So I just added martins auto donation system http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/323057-martins-auto-donation-system.html it works perfectly but when I run my source I get all these messages it still works just want to get rid of them because I believe they cause lag.
